Danica Porter

Danica Porter

Contact Us
  • Emergency Calls: (903) 276-5047

Danica Porter

Council Member of Nash, Texas

Danica Porter is currently the City Secretary/Finance Director for the City of Atlanta, Texas. She began her career with the City of Atlanta in 2011. Danica holds a Master’s Degree in Business Administration from Texas A&M University-Texarkana. Mrs. Porter was elected to serve on the Nash City Council on February 10, 2014. She is a member of Texas Municipal Clerks Association and Government Finance Officers Association of Texas. She is married to Tony who is employed as the Route Manager for Waste Management. They have two daughters Antonia and Alyssa who keep them busy with sports. In her free time, you can find her at one of many sporting events cheering in the stands.

Danica Porter
